extra.message: Found 'subprocess' function 'call' with 'shell=True'. This is dangerous because this call will spawn the command using a shell process. Doing so propagates current shell settings and variables, which makes it much easier for a malicious actor to execute commands. Use 'shell=False' instead.

cwe: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
